Job Title: Staff Accountant

Location: Honolulu, HI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Description

There is a terrific permanent position available for an experienced Staff Accountant at Robert Half. In this position, the Staff Accountant prepares journal entries, monthly and year-end closings, bank reconciliation, fixed asset maintenance and general ledger reconciliation. You will also be responsible for many aspects of internal reporting during the monthly close. You will put your skills towards the development and implementation of accounting policies. In addition, you will review schedules for the reporting processes, take part in compliance, and interact with our external auditors for quarterly reviews and annual audits. This position is very complex as it plays a part in the production of Financial Statements, Cash Flow projections, and Budgets. Located in the Honolulu, Hawaii area, this position is a challenging, multi-faceted opportunity to work for a company that recognizes and rewards hard work. To learn more about this position and to submit your resume please call Noe Silva at 808.452.0264. All inquiries are confidential

Responsibilities

 Compose thorough journal entries and account reconciliations which include, but are not limited to, cash, prepaid expenses, and payroll In-depth experience with reconciling month end balance sheet accounts Produce analyses for monthly balance sheets and income statements for reporting by management Coordinate and analyze a variety of financial data, then report it in a way that is useful and understandable Assist in implementation, maintenance and adherence to internal controls and accounting procedures ensuring compliance with GAAP Handle intercompany transactions, billings, and reconciliation Impromptu reporting and special projects, when requested Manage reconciliation, depreciation, and fixed asset ledgers Maintain capital lease and monthly payment schedules Participate in various department-wide initiatives Perform the month end close and produce journal entries under minimal supervision Assist in the month end, quarter end and year end closing process including monthly financial close workbook preparation Regular maintenance and reconciliation of journal entries


Requirements

 Fully formed organizational, written and verbal communication skills Vow to meet business deadlines Top notch analytical, quantitative and social skills Foundational knowledge in journal entries Proficiency in general ledger HOA experience Command of GAAP Accounting Working knowledge of spreadsheets and databases BA/BS or equivalent in Accounting, Finance or Economics 3+ years of recent and relevant accounting experience Observant, accurate and able to thrive in a fast-paced environment Skilled with ERP systems Self-starter with efficient time management and organizational skills Ability to prioritize deals and adapt to quick changes while remaining diligent, and to thrive in a dynamic, high pressure environment Proficient with spreadsheets and databases
